title: Obtain the Sinner
text: Feel honored I'm willing to walk into this place. I'd like to have a little garden outside my room. Thanks.

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: I recognize your hard work, my child.

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: Enjoy being surrounded by flowers.

title: Level Start
text: Who will bloom under my sword today?

title: Win Battles
text: The splash of petals is incomparably gorgeous.

title: Lose Battles
text: I'll spare your life for now...

title: Ultimate Skill
text: Bloom here, till the day you wither!

title: Die in Battles
text: This will be... the grandest flower shower...

title: Greeting
text: I hope we're both free from work today, so we can stay here... and rest a whole day...

title: Conversation 1
text: I cherish and care for every flower in the Garden. I hope my nurture will give them leaves sharp enough to cut through hardships, so their souls can bloom into the most beautiful flowers...

title: Conversation 2
text: Rules can't confine the wish to bloom. A sprout born in the dark will eventually break them into pieces.

title: Conversation 3
text: Working for pay is only the most basic way of life. The client gains convenience while I gain happiness. I enjoy my life much better than those who hustle for unrealistic, empty goals.

title: Special Conversation 1
text: Those who like flowers pick them. Those who love flowers water them... But I won't mind if you pick me and take me home.

title: Special Conversation 2
text: Don't give me those contrived moral lessons. In this world, nothing means more than the most simple words "I want to."

title: Special Conversation 3
text: A kind and lovely lady like me will wash the dirt off those stems and nurture them properly, so they can be reborn as exquisite flowers in their next lives... Oh, how admirable am I!

title: Full Compliance
text: Flowers in bloom wither in the end. When the day comes, I long to rest in the immortal, deep-blue abyss of yours... May the poppies bloom on your chest like a scarlet blaze... The mark of my genuine affection...

title: Idle
text: Touched by no one. Loved by no one. Though tortured by loneliness, it'll bloom even more brightly.

title: Annoyed
text: Don't think you can get away with anything just because of my affection for you. Or else... You'll be the next to lie in the soil of my garden.

title: Special Attention
text: Sigh... I know, I'm pretty, that's why you can't keep your eyes off me.

title: Dispatch
text: I can't pick up my jacket. Can you put it on me, please?

title: Dispatch Complete
text: Ask someone else to do it next time. It's so not for me.

title: Level Up
text: Look at me. Am I not good enough for you?

title: Join Team
text: Flowers will bloom wherever I go.

title: Head Pat
text: Like this flower? Or... You wanna see how it got tinted red?
